descriptionHtml:
I now have a Full Skimpy pack Page now you can find in  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3654] Here [/url]



Got another Skimpy Armor for all of ya, this time it\'s Glass armor.

What i have done with it is cut off some of the cheat plate to look kinda like a corset. Took the pants off cause who need pants lol ><. And finally shrank the pauldrons so they don\'t look so huge.

I used the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2666] CBBE [/url] mesh in this Mod so you need the textures from his mod for the skin to look good.

If you like this one check out my [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1856479] Profile [/url] for some more skimpy armors. 
 
As always i hope you like it.

-Killer Keo
author: Killer Keo
